name: The Meditator
description:
The Meditator This game was made for TriJam #152 with the theme "Leave me alone!" -About the game-

The player's objective is to keep the meditator undisturbed by eliminating all incoming enemies (Flies, caterpillars, birds, rain) with the available tools.

Each enemy can only be eliminated using a corresponding tool:

For Caterpillars  , use the Spray   to attack

For Flies , use the Slapper   to attack

For Birds , use the Rock  to attack

For Rain  and Bird Poops , use the Umbrella  to cover

-Controls-

Left-click [Mouse] on the enemy to attack

Press 1, 2, 3, 4 on the keyboard or on the screen for tool selection:
